logic

Interface Collidable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Actor, Camera, Chalice, EmptyTile, Enemy, EnemySpawner, Entity, GroundTile, Movable, PistolBullet, Player, PlayerSpawn, Tile

    public interface Collidable
    All class which implements this interface is able to collide with one another. Invoking the other's collideWith methods can have an effect on the invoker object. Also, when left the collision, once a collideExit method may be called.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void collideExit(Entity entity)
      On collision exit, some class invokes this method to interact with the entity collided.
      default void collideWith(Enemy enemy)
      Colliding with an enemy.
      default void collideWith(Entity entity)
      If collision occurs, this method is called on the object whose class implements this interface.
      default void collideWith(PistolBullet pistolBullet)
      Colliding with a pistol bullet.
      default void collideWith(Player player)
      Colliding with the player.
      default void collisionHandling()
      Handling the collision of an object.

    • Method Detail

      • collideWith

        default void collideWith(Entity entity)
        If collision occurs, this method is called on the object whose class implements this interface.
        Parameters:
        entity - the actor who collided with the object.

      • collideWith

        default void collideWith(PistolBullet pistolBullet)
        Colliding with a pistol bullet.
        Parameters:
        pistolBullet - is the bullet which collided.

      • collideWith

        default void collideWith(Enemy enemy)
        Colliding with an enemy.
        Parameters:
        enemy - is the enemy which collided.

      • collideWith

        default void collideWith(Player player)
        Colliding with the player.
        Parameters:
        player - the player which collided.

      • collideExit

        default void collideExit(Entity entity)
        On collision exit, some class invokes this method to interact with the entity collided.
        Parameters:
        entity - the entity which is not colliding anymore.

      • collisionHandling

        default void collisionHandling()
        Handling the collision of an object. Usually called in updates, to get the colliding objects and do something with them.
